widget.name: ResourcePlanner
widget.description: Render an agenda style calendar widget

property.caption: Planner name
property.description: String: Title for the resource planner

property.caption: Planner description
property.description: String: Description for the resource planner

property.caption: Planner column title
property.description: String: Resource column identifier

property.caption: Planner column HTML
property.description: String: Resource column identifier HTML

property.caption: Search from date
property.description: Attribute: Search filter from date (Entity context)

property.caption: Search to date
property.description: Attribute: Search filter to date (Entity context)

property.caption: Use search filter
property.description: Boolean: If yes, then only events/resources between search dates are shown. If no, then all events/resources are shown regardless of dates

property.caption: Search XPath dynamic
property.description: Attribute: Constraint on the 'Event' entity (Dynamic)

property.caption: Search XPath static
property.description: XPath: Constraint on the 'Event' entity (Static)

property.caption: Event entity
property.description: Entity: Event

property.caption: Event start date
property.description: Attribute: Start of event

property.caption: Event end date
property.description: Attribute: End of event

property.caption: Event type
property.description: Attribute: Type label

property.caption: Event bar colour
property.description: Attribute: CSS colour (eg: '#DB3E3E', 'rgb(219, 62, 62)')

property.caption: Event page
property.description: Page: Hyperlink for the event bar

property.caption: Event page display type
property.description: Enumeration: How the event page will be displayed

property.caption: Resource name
property.description: Attribute: Resource row identifier

property.caption: Resource description
property.description: Attribute: Resource row description

property.caption: Resource description default
property.description: String: Resource row description default

property.caption: Resource unique name identifier
property.description: Boolean: If yes, then the resource will only hold items related to the object. If no, then the resource will hold items with the same named resource

property.caption: Resource row colour
property.description: Attribute: CSS colour (eg: '#DB3E3E', 'rgb(219, 62, 62)')

property.caption: Resource page
property.description: Page: Hyperlink for the Resource name

property.caption: Resource page display type
property.description: Enumeration: How the Resource page will be displayed

property.caption: Resource name icon
property.description: String: Glyphicon displayed next to the resource name (eg: 'user' will result glyphicon-user)

property.caption: Sort by
property.description: List: Sort resource rows by

property.caption: Attribute
property.description: Attribute: Sort resource rows by

property.caption: Order
property.description: Enum: Sort order

property.caption: Icon class
property.description: String: CSS classes applied to the button icon, put spaces between multiple classes (eg: 'glyphicon glyphicon-plane')

property.caption: Action type
property.description: Enum: Action type

property.description: Microflow: Call this microflow when button is pressed

property.description: Enumeration: How the page is displayed

property.caption: Hide button text
property.description: Boolean: Hide button text just displaying an icon

property.caption: Visibility
property.description: Enumeration: When is the button visible

property.caption: Visibility attribute
property.description: Attribute: Boolean attribute for visibility

property.description: List: Potential grouping paths

property.caption: Group name
property.description: Attribute: Group planner resources using an identifier (If empty, will leave resources ungrouped)

property.caption: Group description
property.description: Attribute: Description for the planner group

property.caption: Group description default
property.description: String: Default description for the planner group

property.caption: Group unique name identifier
property.description: Boolean: If yes, then the resource will only hold items related to the object. If no, then the resource will hold items with the same named resource

property.caption: Group row colour
property.description: Attribute: CSS colour (eg: '#DB3E3E', 'rgb(219, 62, 62)')

property.caption: Group resource page
property.description: Page: Hyperlink for the Group name

property.caption: Group resource page display type
property.description: Enumeration: How the Group page will be displayed

property.caption: Group name icon
property.description: String: Glyphicon displayed next to the group name (eg: 'user' will result glyphicon-user)

property.caption: Group dates auto generated
property.description: Boolean: If yes, then the event is automatically generated from the children in the group (First 'Start date' and last 'End date'). If no, then the event is generated with the dates set in 'Group event start date' and 'Group event end date'
